name: vkswebui
description: A full-stack web application with: - Flask backend (Flask-Login, Flask-CORS, Flask-SQLAlchemy, SQLite) - React frontend (TailwindCSS, Lucide/FontAwesome icons) - Admin and employee login, role-based access - 5 menus: Center, Collections, Sales, Employee, Accounts (CRUD for each) - Docker/local deployment ready
